Counter-Strike: Global Offensive  is so nice

CS: GO is a team-based first-person shooter game. Players can play as Terrorists or Counter-Terrorists. They can also be chosen to be a part of the Combat-Terrorist, a player who can plant bombs, or a Support-Terrorist, a player who assists other terrorist players with various things such as healing. Each round, the teams start at either one of two positions on a map. The team's objective is to either plant a bomb at the enemy's location or defend the planted bomb. The round ends when all players on a team are dead
